name: Endurance 2
description:
Yep, I'm making another one.

Endurance 2 is exactly how it sounds: Endurance with enhancements and new additions. Along with the core features from the original game, Endurance 2 will include new enemies, bosses, power-ups, and mechanics. Some of these new features are...

  • a larger map to run around in, along with multiple maps
  • collectable power-ups to be used when you need them
  • actual invincibility after a dash! (finally)
  • permanent player upgrades purchased with points
  • enemy spawning improvements
  • new bosses with new mechanics
  • improved graphics
  • and more!

Keep up to date with development of Endurance 2 on this page. Also, if you have a better name for the game, please tell me. "Endurance 2" is kinda clunky.

Thank you for checking out this page!
